mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_AMT, MER_ORDER_ID, TRANS_TIME, AUTH_CODE, PAY_STATUS FROM pay_order WHERE AUTH_CODE = #{authCode} ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT CERT_ID FROM ( SELECT SUM(ORDER_AMT) dayOrderAmt,CERT_ID FROM pay_order WHERE pay_date = #{today} AND PAY_STATUS IN ('payed','paying') GROUP BY CERT_ID,PAY_STATUS ) e ORDER BY e.dayOrderAmt ASC LIMIT 1
